messages.text: Hi, I've reviewed your business plan and I'm very interested in your concept. Could you share more details about your projected market size?
Hi! Thanks for your interest. Our addressable market in Kosovo is approximately €15M annually, with growth potential to expand to North Macedonia and Albania in year 3, increasing our market to €45M.
That's promising. What about your team? Do you have the technical expertise to execute on your roadmap?

Absolutely. Our CTO has 8 years of experience in similar platforms, and we've recently brought on a senior developer from Gjirafa. We're also partnering with the University of Pristina for R&D support.
Great. Could you share your financial projections document? I'd like to review your assumptions on customer acquisition costs.
Of course. I've just added our financial projections to the secure vault. You can access it through the link on the right.
One more question - what are your plans for handling payments? Kosovo has unique challenges in this area.
